titleStmt.title: Mortification apostolicall Delivered in a sermon in Saint Pauls Church, upon summons received for the Crosse: on the last Sunday in Easter terme, May 21. 1637. By VVilliam VVats, Rector of St. Albans Woodstreet London.
titleStmt.author: Watts, William, 1590?-1649.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ohn] L[egat] for Iohn Cowper, and are to be sold at the Holy Lambe neere the east end of Saint Pauls Church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the Holy Lambe neere the east end of Saint Pauls Church
